home.title: Millennia Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Millennia against Automa, the solo opponent.
home.play2: This application replaces the Automa cards, and guides you through the game flow.

setup.gameBoard: Setup the game the same way as a 2-player game.
setup.techCards: The tech cards and blank techs are randomized by the application, you are drafting them in the application against Automa.
setup.playerColor: Choose a player color for the automa. The automa only needs 2 track tokens.
setup.trackTokens: Place the automa track tokens on the war track and on the VP track (starting with 10 VP).

startPlayer.player: You are the start player. Take 10 Gold. Take the first player token.
startPlayer.bot: Automa is the start player. Give it the first player token.

secondPlayer.player: You are the second player. Take 12 Gold. Take the architect token.
secondPlayer.bot: Automa is the second player. Give it the architect token.

botRules.intro: Differences between the automa gameplay and a human player:
botRules.noGold: The automa never has or gains any gold.
botRules.noActions: The automa does not perform any actions in the action phase.
botRules.onlyWarTrack: The automa only promotes on the war track and the VP track but on no other tracks.
botRules.noVP: The automa does not gain or lose any VP other than from the war phase.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
